message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive offer at $110. We're confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, but $110 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. To continue our negotiations, I am proposing a price of $107 for the product. This still allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction.
